OUTLINE : This open-label , multicenter study . Patients receive gemcitabine hydrochloride IV 30 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 , 29 , 36 , 43 , follow 1 week rest ( course 1 ) . For subsequent course , patient receive gemcitabine hydrochloride IV 30 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 . Treatment repeat every 4 week 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life ( QOL ) symptom response assess baseline week 8 , 16 , 32 ( end treatment ) . Questionnaires include Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale-Short Form , Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy-General , Pain Visual Analog Scale , EuroQOL . Patients ' perception symptom response perception treatment burden also assess . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically 3 year .
